scripts.build:all: npm run build:development && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:development: vue-cli-service build --mode development --target lib --inline-vue --name sonnetWeatherWidgets ./src/buildWidgets.js --formats umd-min --dest dist-widgets/dev --report && npm run dev-page
scripts.build:prod: vue-cli-service build --target lib --inline-vue --name sonnetWeatherWidgets ./src/buildWidgets.js --formats umd-min --dest dist-widgets/prod --report && npm run prod-page && npm run copy-css
